alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:49PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Chickasaw and Monroe Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 549 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Prairie to Waverly. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Okolona, Prairie, New Wren, Hatley, Gattman, Binford, Sipsey Fork, New Hamilton, Becker, Quincy, Egypt, Splunge, Wise Gap, Athens, Wren, Strong, East Aberdeen and Muldon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
